medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of the message by identifying the message by a document/message number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date(s), time(s) and periods relating to the whole message, e.g. document/message date.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment providing information on general handling instructions applicable to all data in the message, e.g. assembly and/or preparation of goods for shipment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information. In computer-to-computer exchanges free form text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment to specify control totals.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to specify currencies and relevant details for the rate of exchange.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify charges associated with the handling.

medi:segment.name: Charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, A segment to specify a charge.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate locations where the chargeable action is (to be) performed.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable supplementary information associated with charge.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to specify currencies associated with the charge.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments containing related references and status information at this level.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to express a reference which applies to the HANMOV message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments indicating the HANMOV order status and/or identifying an event and specifying relevant details.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment specifying the status relating to an order for the logistics services.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date and time of the status or event.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment specifying non processable information relating to the status.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment giving information on general handling instructions applicable to order in the HANMOV message, e.g. assembly and/or preparation of goods for shipment.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount associated with order, such as declared value, FOB value, etc.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify a party, related references, locations, contacts and required documents.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address and function, e.g. warehouse/distribution centre.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate locations where a specific function will be performed.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to identify documents required of, by or for the party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to specify references related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference used by a party.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments identifying a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to indicate status details of the movement of goods such as mode and means of transport, locations, departure, and arrival date(s) and time(s).

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment to indicate information related to a certain stage of the transport, such as mode, means and carrier.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments indicating the status of transport and/or identifying an event and specifying relevant details

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment specifying the status relating to a certain stage of transport (e.g. loaded).

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate locations such as transport's origin, destination, stop-off, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating date and time of the status or event.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to specify a reference related to the status.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the status (e.g. House Bill of Lading number).

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating date and time of the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to specify a document and its associated date and time for a transport status.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to specify document details related to the status code, such as indication which document is missing (status code: document missing).

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to associate date and time with the prepared document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments indicating the terms of delivery for the whole HANMOV message

medi:segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TOD, This segment is used to specify terms of delivery for the complete message

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying locations relevant to the terms of delivery e.g place of departure of border crossing point

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments providing details of the individually handled product items.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment identifying the product item being handled or the resulting product code after assembly or disassembly.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: FTX-SG17-LOC-SG18 A group of segments indicating the line item status and/or identifying an event and specifying line items details.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment specifying the status relating to a line item.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment providing additional product identification, e.g. EAN number.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment to describe the product being handled. This segment should be used for products that cannot be identified by a product code or article number.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment to specify handling instructions specific to the product item in addition to and not overriding the handling instructions on message level.

medi:segment.name: Charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, A segment to specify a charge associated with the product item, e.g. assembly charge.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments for identifying names and addresses and their functions.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address and function, e.g. seller, buyer, inspecting party. It is recommended that where possible only the coded form of the party identification should be specified, e.g. when the buyer and seller know each other.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments identifying a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within a party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment identifying physical measurements of the handled product item in original or unpacked form.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to give quantity information concerning the product.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment providing identity numbers of the goods being handled, e.g. serial numbers for assembled products.

medi:segment.name: Related identification numbers
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIR, A segment providing sets of related identification numbers for a product item, e.g. in case of assembly (disassembly) engine number, chassis number and transmission number for a vehicle.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments indicating the status and/or identifying date/time information related to the product item and specifying quantity of items.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment providing date/time information related to the product item, e.g. production date.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to give quantity information concerning the product.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable information, which further clarifies, when required, the product item. In computer-to-computer exchanges free form text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments to give reference numbers and dates.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference related to the product item and/or a reference as a pointer to the goods item number in the GID group.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify date/time/period relating to the reference.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a specific location, e.g. within the warehouse/distribution center.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments providing details how the product item is packed, such as number and type of packages, physical measurements and quantities.

medi:segment.name: Package
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAC, A segment to describe packaging details for the product item.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying physical measurements of packages.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify a quantity of products per package.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments identifying one specific package or a number of packages, their marks and numbers.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment specifying marking and labels used on individual packages or a range of packages.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment providing identification numbers being applied to the packages handled.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 20: RFF-PCI-SG21-SGP-TCC-SG22 A group of segments to describe the goods items for which transport is undertaken.

medi:segment.name: Goods item details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GID, A segment to identify a goods item for which handling is specified. A goods item can be identified at up to three levels of packaging.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment to specify handling instructions specific to the goods item in addition to and not overriding the handling instructions on message level.

medi:segment.name: Customs status of goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CST, A segment to specify goods in terms of customs identities.

medi:segment.name: Temperature
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMP, A segment to specify temperature settings for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment to specify temperature range settings for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying specific locations, e.g. within the warehouse/distribution center.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify monetary amounts associated with a goods item, such as declared value, FOB value, etc.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment to specify article numbers, e.g. in case of repackaging.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable supplementary information relating to the goods item, e.g. goods description.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to specify an address of a place of collection or delivery or inspecting party for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements, other than dimensions, applicable to a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment to specify dimensions applicable to a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify references to a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment to specify marks and numbers of a goods item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments to specify documents and associated date(s) and time(s) for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to specify a document prepared for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to associate date and time with the prepared document.

medi:segment.name: Split goods placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SGP, A segment to identify the equipment in which goods are loaded.

medi:segment.name: Charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, A segment to specify charge associated with the goods item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segments to specify dangerous goods details related to the goods item. One goods item may be in different dangerous goods classes.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment to indicate the class of dangerous goods, packing group, etc.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify the dangerous goods technical name and to specify any additional dangerous goods information.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of that portion of the dangerous goods in the goods item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments to specify equipment in which goods are loaded.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment to specify equipment and equipment size and type used in the transport.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to identify the number of pieces of equipment.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment to identify seal and seal issuer associated with the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Attached equipment
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQA, A segment to identify attached or related equipment such as chassis attached to a container.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference number to equipment
